dict.string: Clero would like to access your camera to capture photos for creating personalized wallpapers with AI style transfer and custom background generation features.
Clero would like to access your contacts to easily share your created wallpapers with friends and family directly from the app.
Clero needs access to your documents to import reference images and export high-quality wallpaper collections for backup and sharing.
Clero uses local network access to share your wallpapers with nearby devices and provide seamless cloud synchronization of your wallpaper collection.
Clero would like to access your microphone to enable voice prompts for wallpaper generation, making it easier to describe your creative ideas hands-free.
Clero would like to save your generated wallpapers to your photo library. This allows you to easily access and set your AI-created wallpapers as your device background.
Clero needs access to your photo library to save the beautiful wallpapers you generate. Your generated AI wallpapers will be saved to your Photos app for easy access and use.
Clero would like to access app-related data for delivering personalized content and improving your experience. Your privacy is important to us, and you can change this permission anytime in Settings.
